Note: The 0.9.0 release is currently under development and the content of this page is unfinished.  We'll post to bigbluebutton-dev when the release is available.

= Introduction =
This document summarizes the major updates in !BigBlueButton 0.9.0  (referred hereafter as 0.9.0).  See  [https://code.google.com/p/bigbluebutton/issues/list?can=1&q=milestone=Release0.9.0 detailed list] for the items completed in this release.

!BigBlueButton 0.9.0 has the following new features:

  * WebRTC Audio (see [https://code.google.com/p/bigbluebutton/issues/detail?id=1544 1544])
  * Improved audio setup (see [https://code.google.com/p/bigbluebutton/issues/detail?id=1699 1699])
  * Listen Only Audio (see [https://code.google.com/p/bigbluebutton/issues/detail?id=353 353])
  * Start/Stop button (see [https://code.google.com/p/bigbluebutton/issues/detail?id=1037 1037])
  * Ability to disable features for viewers (see [https://code.google.com/p/bigbluebutton/issues/detail?id=1702 1702])
  * Installation on Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit (see [https://code.google.com/p/bigbluebutton/issues/detail?id=1275 1275])

Other improvements include:

  * XML pasted into chat now properly displays (see [https://code.google.com/p/bigbluebutton/issues/detail?id=1769 1769])
  * UTF-8 presentation file names now displayed
 (see [https://code.google.com/p/bigbluebutton/issues/detail?id=594 594])  
  * Moderators can raise hand (see [https://code.google.com/p/bigbluebutton/issues/detail?id=1788 1788])

To follow the development of 0.9.0, subscribe to the [https://groups.google.com/group/bigbluebutton-dev/topics?gvc=2 bigbluebutton-dev mailing list].

For users of Mozilla FireFox and Google Chrome, !BigBlueButton 0.9.0 now uses webRTC for the audio channel.
